subSections.title: See also
subSections.text: * {{l|mul|替}} [[賛]] {{qualifier|top simplified from 竝 and 兟}}

subSections.title: Glyph origin
Etymology 1
subSections.text: From {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*p/ba||male, father, third-person pronoun}}. Cognate with {{cog|bo|པ||''masculine noun suffix''}}, {{cog|my|ဖ||''masculine noun suffix''}}. Possibly related to {{och-l|父|father}}.

subSections.title: Etymology 2
subSections.text: “That”. {{zh-ref|Schuessler (2007)}} connects this with Proto-Loloish *''m-ba'' (“on the other side”), {{cog|bo|ཕ||beyond, farther on, onward}}. Maybe related to {{och-l|彼|that}}.

{{ja-readings
|goon=ふ, ぶ
|kanon=ふ
|kanyoon=ふう
|kun=おっと-<をつと, そ-れ
|nanori=お, と, ゆう, よ
}}
